comments.body:
It's confusing that Weight goes here and not in the config.

I'd consider separating the Enabled list, make it []string, leaving it atomic, and having a separate list of plugin params that is listType=map, and sets the Weight but doesn't determine the order. For your followups, not this PR.
Uhm... we were not planning to change this. I'm not sure about the original rationale. @ahg-g @Huang-Wei ?

Basically we can have these designs, the difference is quite trivial to me. (maybe @ahg-g knows more usecases)

- `Plugin` has Weight, `PluginConfig` holds Args (Args is optional and of type `runtime.Unknown`)
- Just one `PluginConfig` to hold Name, Weight, and Args.
- As @lavalamp said, `Plugin` to hold just name (hence can be refactored to []string in Enabled list), and `PluginConfig` to hold Name, Weight and Args.
where is the default set of plugins specified?
We currently do not have any plugins and therefore, no set of default plugins. We will add plugins in the next step and after the main components and extension points of the framework are built.
where is the default config described?
could still use clarification over where the defaults come from
